testimonials.name: Marcos Walnei
testimonials.title: Managing Director PEC
testimonials.text: Lucas has added significantly to our business throughout Brazil and we are very satisfied with his delivery quality and results in this partnership of almost three years. üëç

testimonials.name: Laiza Zotarelli
testimonials.title: Viva em Festa's Owner
testimonials.text: Lucas had all the tranquility and security we needed when opening our online store, developing everything without me having to worry about anything! I am very pleased and confident to know that I can count on him when I need to. üôå

testimonials.name: Jean Gon√ßalves
testimonials.title: Full stack Developer
testimonials.text: An exceptional professional, who always aims to fulfill his goals in the best possible way. It is very satisfying to solve problems with those who have never lost the will to teach and help. üëå

testimonials.name: Pedro Perna
testimonials.title: Osphere Clothing's Owner
testimonials.text: Lucas has added significantly to our business throughout Brazil and we are very satisfied with his delivery quality and results in this partnership of almost three years. üëç
